arts.ttl: Kane and Olise at Oktoberfest, Roma fans protest, Gallagher scores again
arts.sum: Angry fans refusing to come into the stadium, and celebrating a win at Oktoberfest - BBC Sport rounds up action from the European leagues.

arts.ttl: Atletico coach Simeone optimistic despite another frustrating LaLiga draw
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone took the positives from his side's performance in a 1-1 draw at Rayo Vallecano on Sunday, their third stalemate in LaLiga this season.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Atlético can’t overcome dismal first half in Vallecas
arts.sum: Couldn’t do much to halt Rayo’s 35th-minute goal after Isi Palazón slipped past the slow-footed duo of César Azpilicueta and Axel Witsel. His ball to Ángel Correa started the attack which led to Conor Gallagher’s goal.

Rayo Vallecano started the season with four points from their first two matches but faced consecutive defeats to Barcelona and Espanyol before bouncing back with a 3-1 win over Osasuna, placing them n...

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid star Conor Gallagher shares a special moment with Chelsea youth players just a month after his Blues departure
arts.sum: Gallagher was pictured all smiles alongside a number of youngsters from Chelsea's academy who stopped by to watch the midfielder having travelled to Spain for the Madrid Football Cup.
